description.en: iPhone X 📱 - responds to tap 👆, voice 🗣️, and glance 👀. Large 5.8" Super Retina screen 🌟 with durable glass 💎. Designed to impress! ✨
description.es: iPhone X 📱 - responde a toque 👆, voz 🗣️, y mirada 👀. Gran pantalla Super Retina 5.8" 🌟 con vidrio duradero 💎. ¡Diseñado para impresionar! ✨
description.hi: आईफोन X 📱 - टैप 👆, आवाज़ 🗣️, और नज़र 👀 पर प्रतिक्रिया। बड़ी 5.8" सुपर रेटिना स्क्रीन 🌟 टिकाऊ कांच 💎 के साथ। प्रभावित करने के लिए डिज़ाइन! ✨
description.zh: iPhone X 📱 - 响应轻触 👆、声音 🗣️ 和眼神 👀。5.8" Super Retina 屏幕 🌟 配耐用玻璃 💎。旨在令人印象深刻！ ✨

product.name: Apple iPhone X - 256 GB
product.description: Meet the iPhone X - the device that's so smart that it responds to a tap, your voice, and even a glance. Elegantly designed with a large 14.73 cm 5.8 Super Retina screen and a durable front-and-back glass, this smartphone is designed to impress.
